Claim: "Dirty water, dirty air, and insect-borne diseases are a far greater problem today for most people world-wide."
Implication: "Global warming is not the obvious top environmental threat."
Referring expressions: Dirty water, dirty air, insect-borne diseases, most people, world-wide  Global warming, environmental threat
Properties: IsDirty(a),  IsInsectBorne(c),  IsForMostPeople(d),  IsWorldWide(e)  IsGlobalWarming(f),  IsEnvironmentalThreat(g)
Formula: (exists d (exists c (exists e (exists a ((IsDirty(a) and IsInsectBorne(c)) and (IsForMostPeople(d) and IsWorldWide(e)))))) & (forall h (forall i ( IsDirty(h) ->   IsEnvironmentalThreat(i))))) -> (exists g (exists f (IsGlobalWarming(f) and ~IsEnvironmentalThreat(g))))
